3: ...Establishing connection...
Connected.
What's the matter? Why are you suddenly stopping?
■■■, this may sound a bit weird... but I feel like Commandant is just nearby.
Commandant?! Since when are you here... No, I guess you aren't 'here.'
■■■■■ is on a mission. I just happened to be around and came to help.
Hmm. Looks like something must have happened to you, Commandant.
Connection chamber, huh... I've heard about it in a meeting with the ■■■■■ Association before.
■■■■■, I think part of our conversation was blocked. Can you feel it...?
Yeah, probably some special setting of the connection chamber... But why does it block our names in particular?

2: But I can tell who you are. Lee and Sophia.
4: But why redact Lee's and Sophia's names?

3: Wait a sec. So we are Lee and Sophia in Commandant's eyes... Oh!
It's also interfering with Commandant's vision, huh...
We can say the names as Commandant sees us, but not our real ones. That's one complicated April Fool's joke.
...So I am Sophia to you now. Is that so, Commandant?
And I am Lee... I guess this makes us the two musketeers now.
...I think Lee will hate that title.
Ahem, Sophia, what are you talking about? I'm Lee now. And I think that's a good title.
Now's not the time to mess around, ■■.
True. Let's defeat the Corrupted and rescue our commandant. No one can escape my shots!
